attributes.description: It all begins with the spaciousness of the cabin, which offers excellent head, shoulder, and leg room as well as a number of storage spaces for odds and ends. There is no shoulder rubbing in a Steed 5. It features comfortable individual bucket seats, and a neat, padded center armrest that doubles as a large storage box between the seats.
